I am Mingkai Dong, currently an Associate Professor at the Institute of Parallel and Distributed Systems (IPADS), School of Computer Science, Shanghai Jiao Tong University. I am interested in all aspects of operating systems, with a particular focus on file and storage systems, including kernel-level storage solutions and emerging media such as DNA storage. Of course, in the wave of âmarching toward AGI,â my work has also (inevitably) expanded to large models and agents, especially storage challenges in multi-modal models. I have published a number of papers in operating systems, mainly in storage systems, at conferences such as SOSP, OSDI, FAST, USENIX ATC, NSDI, and EuroSys, and in journals including Nature, ACM TOCS, and ACM TOS1. For more details, please visit the Publications page.
